base.name: LookupTable1d
base.description: The block models non-linearity by mapping inputs to an output value by looking up or interpolating a table of values, in this case, the table is 2 1d arrays.

parameter_definitions.name: input_array
parameter_definitions.description: Array on which the input is mapped

parameter_definitions.name: output_array
parameter_definitions.description: Array on which the output is mapped
